title: Here’s a first look at Apple TV+ workplace comedy ‘Loot’ starring Maya Rudolph
content:
Are you already missing a workplace show on Apple TV+ after Severance? Fear no more, as Loot, starring Emmy Award winner Maya Rudolph, is the newest Apple Original announced by the company. This time, it’s important to say, it’s a workplace comedy.

more…

The post Here’s a first look at Apple TV+ workplace comedy ‘Loot’ starring Maya Rudolph appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: "Loot," starring Emmy Award winner Maya Rudolph, is the newest Apple Original announced by the company set to hit TV+ in June.
